name: Stellar Guardian (DEMO)
description:
Stellar Guardian is a fast paced top-down-shooter roguelike game with Space theme and gorgeous pixel art. inspired by Nuclear Throne and Enter The Gungeon.

THIS DEMO INCLUDE:

- 10 Weapon

- 5 Item

- 2 Playeble Characters

- 1 Dungeon

- 1 Boss and 6 enemies

CONTROL:

CREDITS:

- Falah Zaidan (Programmer, Artist)

- Fakhri Zaidi (Artist)

Music : 

- Elektrobear

- Fesliyan Studios

- Zaplat

Note: This Game technically is our first  game, so feel free to give us as many feedback as you have, any feedback would be appreciated. also for The Linux version is Untested, because we didn't have Linux PC to test it. if you encounter any problem. you can email us on: yawnpotatos@gmail.com or comment down below.
